verses.verse: בְּצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> be-Tzet went out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el When Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob מֵעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> me-'Am from a people לֹעֵֽז׃ <S%H3937><s%> lo-'Ez. of strange language

הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah became יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah לְקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> le-ka-de-Sho; was his sanctuary יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, [and] Israel מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4475><s%> mam-she-lo-Tav. his dominion

הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam The sea רָ֭אָה <S%H7200><s%> Ra-'ah saw וַיָּנֹ֑ס <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nos; [it] and fled הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan יִסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> yis-So was driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> le-'a-Chor. back

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> He-ha-rim The mountains רָקְד֣וּ <S%H7540><s%> ra-ke-Du skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> che-'ei-Lim; like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ge-va-'ot, [and] the little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> kiv-nei- afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> Tzon. cattle

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לְּךָ֣ le-Cha הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> Hai-yom What [ailed] thee O thou sea כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תָנ֑וּס <S%H5127><s%> ta-Nus; that thou fleddest הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, ;thou Jordan תִּסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> tis-So [that] thou wast driven לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> le-'a-Chor. O

הֶֽ֭הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> He-ha-rim Ye mountains תִּרְקְד֣וּ <S%H7540><s%> tir-ke-Du [that] ye skipped כְאֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> che-'ei-Lim; like rams גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ge-va-'ot, [and] ye little hills כִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> kiv-nei- afflicted צֹֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> Tzon. cattle

מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei at the presence אָ֭דוֹן <S%H113><s%> 'A-don of the Lord ח֣וּלִי <S%H2342><s%> Chu-li Tremble אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; thou earth מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei, at the presence אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-ah of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

הַהֹפְכִ֣י <S%H2015><s%> ha-ho-fe-Chi Which turned הַצּ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> hatz-Tzur the rock אֲגַם־ <S%H98><s%> 'a-gam- [into] a standing מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; water חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ <S%H2496><s%> chal-la-Mish, the flint לְמַעְיְנוֹ־ <S%H4599><s%> le-ma'-ye-nov- into a fountain מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. of waters
